---
category: news
title: "How Machine-Learning Differs from Human Learning"
excerpt: "Human children (but not AI) develop ideas of right and wrong gradually, with morals emerging in stages. Human children (but not AI) learn in the context of parents and teachers who guide their moral development. As we create more human-like machines, we must train the next level AI to be ethical."
